game.name: Cube & Seek
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Relax and find hidden objects in handcrafted 3D tiny cube worlds. Search for hidden treasures and enjoy fun interactive surprises along the way!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Relax and find hidden objects in handcrafted 3D tiny cube worlds. Search for hidden treasures and enjoy fun interactive surprises along the way!
